column1: The COVID-19 pandemic has heavily impacted our small businesses this year. If you have the means to please support a local small business today. #SmallBusinessSaturday https://t.co/7mvFqgU7u5

Thanks to Operation Warp Speed & the Trump Administration if the FDA approves the Pfizer vaccine we will have 100 million doses ready for distribution. Americans will be able to receive the vaccine free of cost. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/VBKWn5l0jE

Pending FDA Emergency Use Authorizations we may have up to 100 mil doses of FDA-authorized vaccine by the end of the year & project having manufactured enough doses for every American who wants a vaccine by March-April 2021. #OperationWarpSpeed #COVID19

The Trump Administration’s goal is to ensure every American can get a safe & effective #COVID19 vaccine w/o any out of pocket cost. Any vaccine or therapeutic doses purchased w/ U.S. taxpayer $$ will be given to the American people at no cost. #operationwarpspeed https://t.co/4P1fYOsp9M

For months Nancy Pelosi has held up aid for our small businesses. This week my Republican colleagues & I said enough & that it’s time to bring this bill to the House floor for a vote. Read my full release here: https://t.co/whnBgR9AFv #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/2fi1zaKMTy
My prayers are with @realDonaldTrump & Melania as well as all of those currently recovering from #COVID19. (2/2)

I’m wishing @realDonaldTrump & Melania a speedy recovery. #COVID19 is a tough adversary; however the President & First Lady are fighters. We’ve made outstanding progress with treatments in the past few months & I’m confident that both will overcome this quickly. (1/2)

#OperationWarpSpeed is not only an effort to find a #COVID19 COVID19 vaccine; it's an effort to find safe & effective therapeutics as well. I'm amazed by the scientific advancements we've seen in the past few months. Watch the video below to learn more. #FL02 https://t.co/PdDvSqOOLz

The scientific advances I've seen in the past few months have been absolutely incredible. We're another step closer to restoring renewing & rebuilding our great nation.  #OperationWarpSpeed #COVID19 #FL02 https://t.co/ZYEgtIAa0d

I applaud President Trump & his Administration for taking the initiative to make our nation more independent as we fight the #COVID19 pandemic. For far too long we’ve relied on suppliers outside of the US & our allies for medical supplies & essential prescription drugs. #FL02

It is easy to give up hope & succumb to fear but that is a recipe for failure for us & our children. The only way to overcome this pandemic is to approach it with facts courage & a level-head. Read my latest op-ed here: https://t.co/jdQd1fnPzC #FL02 #COVID19
If you have recovered from #COVID19 PLEASE consider donating plasma. Your donation could save lives! #FL02 #Florida https://t.co/HYSP9PIEY2
As we continue to combat #COVID19 and head into a holiday weekend I want to share some updated commonsense tips to protect you & your family. #Florida #FL02 https://t.co/3xXDlLHSYy

This is the good news we all need right now! While I was confident we’d overcome this I’m still impressed by the numbers. I commend the Trump Administration for their outstanding work! #FL02 #jobs #COVID19  https://t.co/zg0mumIUnd

Yesterday I had an outstanding chat with @alexsalvinews on @OANN about my experience with #COVID19 & Phase One of Florida's reopening.   You can watch the FULL interview here: https://t.co/cPev54FiUR #FL02 https://t.co/xNE3IfDvyh

In times like these we should be more focused on using taxpayer dollars to help the American people.  NOT handpicking select committees for political purposes.  I do not see a compelling reason for yet another oversight mechanism. #FL02 #COVID19

Speaker Pelosi has created a “House Select Committee on the Coronavirus Crisis” but there are already EIGHT mechanisms to oversee the govt’s response.   Why does she want to add her own select committee? #FL02 #COVID02

Today the House will vote on HR 266 the Paycheck Protection Program & Health Care Enhancement Act.   Here's what you need to know about the bill: https://t.co/MGXLkllzBQ #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/kwDMXSAph6

The IRS is hosting a webinar for Main Street businesses & workers on Thursday April 23rd at 2 pm ET/1 pm CT. Visit this page for more details - https://t.co/3TJluHPLpn #SmallBusinessRelief #COVID19 #FL02

Social media can be a helpful resource to reach out to those you currently can't be with in person. However social media feeds also contain a lot of misinformation. @fema has created a helpful page to clear up rumors - https://t.co/Tf4Gj6ShAV #FL02 #COVID19

I find it alarming that some of my peers are holding hostage essential funding that has now run dry. Now is not the time to play dirty politics. We must put the well-being of this nation first. (3/3) #FL02 #COVID19

I support @realDonaldTrump in hitting the pause button on WHO funding. We need to reevaluate the use of taxpayer dollars & whether they would be better spent in combating #COVID19 & preventing the spread of future pandemics.
The @WHO was negligent & potentially complicit in the Chinese coverup of the #Coronavirus which has so far claimed the lives of 26000 Americans & brought the world to the brink of economic meltdown.

Thanks @FoxFriendsFirst for having me on this morning! While the number of deaths has increased the number of new cases is decreasing daily. This is a good sign However expanding access to testing will give us a better idea of how bad this actually is. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/8SbujsAMxP

Some much-needed relief for many in #FL02 -- FEMA has announced the suspension of rent payment for the months of April May and June for disaster survivors living in FEMA-purchased temporary housing units. Read more here: https://t.co/MJeElBKjjt #COVID19 #HurricaneMichael

Many of you might have seen the news about my recent trip to the hospital but I believe you all should hear it from me as well. I'm feeling great & I cannot thank you enough for all of the support. Together we can beat this. #FL02 #COVID19 https://t.co/YSDEVO5lR3

I couldn't be more proud of #FL02! We saw many go beyond the call of duty following Hurricane Michael & we're seeing more do the same as we continue to combat #COVID19. From the bottom of my heart THANK YOU! https://t.co/n5GKuJuFuC

The SBA North Florida District Office will host 2 informational calls TOMORROW to help #smallbusiness owners get a better understanding of the resources available to them as they recover from the #COVID19 pandemic. More info here: https://t.co/IvEv6l8uXQ #FL02

ATTN Small Business Owners: Here’s an excellent resource that shows which nearby lenders are participating in the Small Business Paycheck Protection Program - https://t.co/if54uUdCJD… #FL02 #COVID19 #SmallBusinesses https://t.co/wWLnxf7vXa

When we passed the CARES Act last month we included the Paycheck Protection Program. If you own a small business & are in need of assistance please visit https://t.co/VjFs1SAU0S.  You can find more resources on my website: https://t.co/48Ww7SJTU0 #Covid_19 #FL02 https://t.co/rU5O8K8mTK

Some good news to start your day -   Yesterday #FL posted the lowest number of new #COVID19 cases since 3/30. We still have thousands of cases but this is progress. We must keep working together to continue this trend. https://t.co/NGamUaM6Ra #FL02

Please do not immediately run out to buy as many masks as possible. Medical personnel need those resources more than we do.   Many hospitals & facilities are dealing with a shortage of resources. Please consider donating any extra masks you may have. #FL02 #COVID19

A member of my staff was kind enough to share this link she's been using to create her own face masks. I encourage you to get creative & send us photos or directions for your own DIY mask. #FL02 #COVID19 #Coronavirus https://t.co/EECZe8Lk6I

Governor DeSantis has issued a stay-at-home order for the entire state of Florida. Here's what that means for us. #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus   Note: You WILL be able to get essential groceries. Please refrain from panic buying. https://t.co/oGCpS2expH

Today the Treasury Department & the IRS announced that distribution of economic impact payments will begin in the next 3 weeks.  Here's what you need to know: https://t.co/T8CHGXK2VM #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus

Today we celebrate National Doctors' Day. These brave men & women are currently on the frontlines as we battle the #COVID19. Now more than ever these hardworking individuals deserve our recognition & gratitude.   To my fellow doctors THANK YOU. #FL02 https://t.co/rCGci24a7m

Today I supported the CARES Act. This bill is not perfect & has a very large price tag. However a crisis of this magnitude requires Congress to act swiftly & decisively.   Watch my FULL floor speech below. #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/zdkWk1n82A
The House has officially passed the CARES Act. Stay tuned for updates about how to file for small business loans & more. #FL02 #COVID19 #Coronavirus https://t.co/stCWQYY0Sb
The House is scheduled to vote on the CARES Act this week. Here's what you can expect from Phase III of the #COVID19 relief legislation. #FL02 #Coronavirus https://t.co/waWFP9Vdhw

We’ve come to understand the virus in much more meaningful and deep ways... Will it go away like a seasonal flu? It will. Will it come back in the fall? Probably.   Check out my FULL interview with the @The_News_Herald here - https://t.co/Yz44SgPjSg #FL02 #Coronavirus

While many parents guardians & students are adapting to at-home schooling I wanted to share some outstanding resources from the National Archives. Their Education staff has created a helpful list in their Education Updates blog - https://t.co/IdwdQz6RUR #FL02 #Coronavirus

This declaration will help meet medical supplies and equipment hand sanitizer soap masks disinfectants food paper products & other groceries for emergency restocking of distribution centers or stores. (3/3) #FL02 #Coronavirus

Following my call FMCSA issued an expanded national emergency declaration to provide additional regulatory relief to commercial vehicle drivers transporting emergency supplies in response to the nationwide #COVID19 outbreak. This is great news for all Americans. (2/3) #FL02

UPDATE - Yesterday I spoke with the @USDOT's Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration Acting Admin Jim Mullen to address gaps in the grocery supply chain given the increased demand for supplies in the #Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak. (1/3) #FL02

Many testing locations throughout the country are seeing long lines & wait times. Take a moment to check out this helpful resource from @HealthyFla to find out if you should get tested: https://t.co/hC5yeBX9SX #FL02 #coronavirus #COVID19

While many are at home this week watching children or teleworking I want to share some tips for protecting your home from #Coronavirus & #COVID19. For more resources visit my website here: https://t.co/48Ww7SJTU0 Or the CDC website here: https://t.co/4y5vNTMVU0 #FL02 https://t.co/JbybHZSM3r

Last night’s passage of The Families First Coronavirus Response Act is an important step in our fight against #Coronavirus and #COVID19. The well-being of my family friends and constituents is always first and foremost on my mind. (1/4) #FL02

In case you didn't receive the email I sent out w/ important resources to help you combat #Coronavirus here is a link. My team is currently working to get this on my website. I'll continue to keep you posted as things progress.   https://t.co/qEeF99wWof #FL02
Check out some #TipsFromDocCaucus that can help you protect yourself and others from the #coronavirus. #FL02 https://t.co/aFeoZvWkQp

Shout out to @HHSGov for letting me stop by their facility today! These folks are doing an exceptional job of trying to mitigate the spread of #Coronavirus & #COVID19.   For more info on how to prevent the spread of this disease click here: https://t.co/XzRefcvHnW #FL02 https://t.co/p0cJZSIhZY

It’s always a pleasure chatting with constituents about issues that matter!   Thanks to those who were able to join me today for a quick Tele Townhall regarding the Coronavirus/COVID-19.  Stay tuned for more updates! #FL02 #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/IdzgLDDd91

Do you know the signs of #COVID19?  While ALL of us should be using preventative measures to properly combat COVID-19 it's important to know what this illness looks like.  You can find more information on symptoms & prevention here: https://t.co/Kcd8y8wA2U #FL02 https://t.co/v5n1RFfMmr
I want to help you protect yourself and your family. Stay tuned for more updates as this progresses.  #FL02 #Florida #COVID19 https://t.co/kv8O51SdXm

GREAT NEWS! The #Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act (H.R. 6074) which would provide $7.8 billion in emergency funding for the U.S. response to COVID-19 has just been passed in the House. #FL02 #Florida https://t.co/U8oOPxt8X1
